name: Hiyori Rush
description: Deals large physical damage to an enemy directly in front and deals moderate physcal damage to all enemies in a small radius around it.

name: Kitty Kapow
description: Deals moderate physical damage to an enemy directly in front.

name: Kitty Combo
description: Deals small physical damage to an enemy directly in front. Boosts own physical attack by a moderate amount.

name: Paw Power
description: Moderate boost to own physical attack at start of battle.

name: Paw Power+
description: Large boost to own physical attack at start of battle.

name: Group Heal
description: Recovers a moderate amount of HP for all allies.

name: Blooming Blast
description: Inflicts a moderate amount of magical damage to one enemy directly in front.

name: Flower Guard
description: Small boost to physical defense of all allies.

name: Floral Aura
description: Moderate boost to own magical attack at start of battle.

name: Floral Aura+

name: Hurricane Slash
description: Deals massive physical damage to an enemy directly in front.

name: Wind Thrust
description: Deals moderate physical damage to an enemy directly in front.

name: Counter Slash

name: Rapid Riposte+

name: Trick Bomber

name: Ink Spray
